metadata.title: 5426-1 -- needrestart vulnerability
metadata.description: Jakub Wilk discovered that needrestart incorrectly used some regular expressions. A local attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5426-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  needrestart - 3.5-4ubuntu2.1 No subscription required
